message:
Microsoft is starting its rollout of Windows 8.1 Update on April 2. The new features and changes are starting to make this an operating system I actually want to use.

http://www.zdnet.com/microsofts-windows-8-1-update-what-windows-8-should-have-been-from-the-start-7000027976/
name: Microsoft's Windows 8.1 Update: What Windows 8 should have been from the start | ZDNet
caption: www.zdnet.com
description: Microsoft is starting its rollout of Windows 8.1 Update on April 2. The new features and changes are starting to make this an operating system I actually want to use.
